poll_list.title: 🚀 Moonshot Workstream Allocation
poll_list.body:
Through this proposal, the prototyping workstream is requesting a governance reward budget of 40,000 GTC to be deployed over Q3 2021.

These funds will be distributed by @austingriffith and @owocki to builders via scholarships and through funding allocation techniques like Coordinape. 

We have already started building a few starter kits and demoed them during our first call.

We need to start funding developers! Help us empower the next wave of Ethereum builders!
poll_list.author: 0x34aA3F359A9D614239015126635CE7732c18fDF3
